entry.title: $2050 // High End Designer style apartment
entry.content:
Available move in NOW!!!!!


Beautiful apartment in L.I.C./Astoria (Amazon zone!!!)

1 Bedroom and 1 Bath

5 min walk to the train (N & W) (2 Stops to midtown) or 8 min walk to 7 or F train (3 Stops to City)

7 blocks to 59 Street Bridge

Everything in the apartment and building is updated! and detail to originality to keep the character of original design!

Granite counter tops and brand new Stainless Steel appliances

Custom tile work in kitchen and bathroom

LED lighting throughout

Solid oak wood doors and molding carefully brought back to it's Original beauty

Closets in bedroom with storage on top

Closet in the living room

Rooftop access

Bike room available

Security cameras on every floor


Need to see to believe!
